languages.text: "Не вини себя. Если еретики и впрямь проникли в ряды слуг фон Валанциус уже тогда — они нашли бы планету, даже не отправься ты туда".
"No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."
languages.original_text: "Не вини себя. Если еретики и впрямь проникли в ряды слуг фон Валанциус уже тогда — они нашли бы планету, даже не отправься ты туда".

traits.locale_text: "No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."
"No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."
"No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."
"No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."
"No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."

languages.text: “不必苛责自己。如果早在那个时候，异端分子就已经渗透进了冯·瓦兰修斯的身边，就算你当时没去，他们也会发现那颗行星。”
languages.original_text: "No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."

traits.locale_text: “不必苛责自己。如果早在那个时候，异端分子就已经渗透进了冯·瓦兰修斯的身边，就算你当时没去，他们也会发现那颗行星。”

languages.text: «No se culpe. Si los herejes ya habían infiltrado las filas de los von Valancius en aquel momento, habrían encontrado el planeta aunque no hubiese ido».
languages.original_text: "No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."

traits.locale_text: «No se culpe. Si los herejes ya habían infiltrado las filas de los von Valancius en aquel momento, habrían encontrado el planeta aunque no hubiese ido».

languages.text: 「自分を責める必要はない。その時までに異端者たちが本当にフォン・ヴァランシウスの仲間に入り込んでいたのなら…お前がそこに行かなくても、彼らはこの惑星を見つけていたことだろう」
languages.original_text: "No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."

traits.locale_text: 「自分を責める必要はない。その時までに異端者たちが本当にフォン・ヴァランシウスの仲間に入り込んでいたのなら…お前がそこに行かなくても、彼らはこの惑星を見つけていたことだろう」

languages.text: "Ihr tragt keine Schuld daran. Wenn die Ketzer sich zu dem Zeitpunkt wirklich schon in die Reihen derer von Valancius eingeschlichen hatten – dann hätten sie den Planeten auch gefunden, wenn Ihr nicht hingereist wärt."
languages.original_text: "No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr tragt keine Schuld daran. Wenn die Ketzer sich zu dem Zeitpunkt wirklich schon in die Reihen derer von Valancius eingeschlichen hatten – dann hätten sie den Planeten auch gefunden, wenn Ihr nicht hingereist wärt."

languages.text: « Inutile de culpabiliser. Si les hérétiques s'étaient infiltrés dans les rangs des von Valancius, ils auraient fini par trouver la planète même si vous n'y étiez pas allée. »
languages.original_text: "No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de culpabiliser. Si les hérétiques s'étaient infiltrés dans les rangs des von Valancius, ils auraient fini par trouver la planète même si vous n'y étiez pas allée. »

languages.text: "Kendini suçlamamalısın. Kâfirler gerçekten von Valancius saflarına sızmayı başardıysa... Sen onları götürmesen de gezegeni bulurlardı."
languages.original_text: "No need to blame yourself. If the heretics really had wormed their way into the von Valancius ranks by then — they would have found the planet even without you going there."

traits.locale_text: "Kendini suçlamamalısın. Kâfirler gerçekten von Valancius saflarına sızmayı başardıysa… Gezegeni sen gitsen de gitmesen de bulurlardı."
